pkgmetadata.longdescription:
PGObject-Util-PGConfig is a Perl module for programmatically managing the configuration of PostgreSQL servers. It is capable of generating arbitrary postgresql.conf and recovery.conf files, and can make appropriate changes to PostgreSQL systems via ALTER SYSTEM.
In the later case, it can filter out unknown configuration variables, changing only those known by the server. This reduces the risk of downtime due to misconfiguration and it allows renamed configuration options to be specified together across Postgresql versions.
